DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to examine the amount of sunlight exposure and vitamin D status of adolescent schoolchildren of South Asian ethnicity in each season throughout the year.
DOC.brief_title: Sunlight Exposure and Vitamin D Status of Children of South Asian Ethnicity Living in the UK
DOC.criteria: Healthy schoolchildren aged 1215 years Sunreactive skin type V (naturally brown skin) South Asian ethnicity Male or female History of photosensitivity disorder Nonambulant
